u: Note: The position is NOT eligible for C2C

i: R, Python or scripting language is required. Experience with Tableau or other data visualization tools is preferred
4+ years of experience generating business insights through data analysis

p.10: The FS Marketing & Growth Analytics team is helping lead the effort to transform healthcare and drive improved customer experience by partnering with key business areas across the company to deliver impactful analytics solutions and insights. As a member of the Analytics & Behavior Change (A&BC) Data Science team, you will be at the forefront of delivering high visibility and analytics projects for key Retail strategic priorities. Specifically, you will have the opportunity to drive revenue and customer satisfaction in company's Front Store business using advanced analytics solutions to evaluate store performance. You will have the chance to solve complex problems, design experiment, build predictive models, and simulate impact of business decisions to improve customer experience.
p.11: We are a fast-paced team focused on building innovative analytics approaches. As a FS Marketing and Growth Analytics Data Scientist, you will focus on understanding of stores performance. Key responsibilities will include measuring business impact of Front Store operational initiatives. The ideal candidate will have a strong analytics background with experience leveraging SQL to solve business problems, mining large data sets and using control selection tool to build control groups, develop statistical models and assessing the values of marketing programs. Demonstrated self-direction and applied critical and creative thinking to business challenges is expected.

p.33: If you think this position is a good fit for you, please reach out to me - feel free to call, text, e-mail, or apply to this posting!
